page.title: 19Cockerham Shops & Restaurant
page.content: Those people who live in the Parish of Cockerham have essential everyday needs supplied by the village shop and P.O.,Butchers shop and the restaurant,augmented by weekly visit of a fresh fish van. The village street has housed some type of provision shop for more than 100 years & 1 cottage has evidence of a wall Postbox of indeterminable age.Norman & Pam Bailey became proprietors of the shop 4 years ago.In that time they have modernised & extended into part self service.They retail food and a range of other items,complemented by Sub.P.O.service.Kevin & Dora Dewhurst Butchers for 5 yrs,provide most meats and products.Two years ago they resited their shop to the rear and opened a cafe in the old shop area.This was changed later to a Licensed Restaurant seating 28.
